title: At least 90 arrests at major Palestine Action protest in London
description:
AT least 90 people have been arrested at a protest in London against the banning of Palestine Action as a terror group.

Around 100 people gathered in Tavistock Square Gardens, central London, on Saturday afternoon for the Defend Our Juries protest, as police officers formed a queue to methodically ...

title: Business News: Importance of critical minerals
description: In political and resource circles, the term critical minerals is all rage. What are they and can they play an important role in boosting economic growth? Financial analyst, Michael Campbell joins Global News Morning with Business news.

title: Spain, Palestine will hold first summit this year: PM Sanchez
description:
Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez announced that Spain and Palestine will hold their first bilateral summit this year to strengthen ties.

"Before the end of this year we are going to hold the first bilateral summit between Spain and Palestine in which we hope to sign several collaboration agreem...

title: Stormont: DUP bid to overturn minister's Israel trade block fails
description:
